ygData.subject: RE: Sitting Fear spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, no sitting here anyways And Our Server GM acknowledged the bug Now we wait for fix I guess :( Joatmos ... From: 	Karim [mailto:kam@apci.net] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, no sitting here anyways
And Our Server GM acknowledged the bug
Now we wait for fix I guess :(

Joatmos
-----Original Message-----
From: Karim [mailto:kam@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 4:23 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Sitting Fear spell

From: Karim <kam@...>



I have done negafen several times, as far as i know loosing control of
hot keys only happened when players *SIT* several times to cancel the
effect of fear.

Sitting repeatedly while under fear or charm seem to cause this. I am
not sure if it's Verant answer to players cheesing out the effect or if
it's just a bug.

I usually just type /q and come back.I am not sure why u lost the fight
just cause of that unless u didnt have enough people.It takes me no
longer than about 30 secs to get back in.Considering it only happen 1
time per fight or so on average and that its a long long fight it
should'nt tip the balance too much.

Btw is negafen dropping anything for magii
classes(necros,enchanters,wiz,magiciants)? On my server it hasnt dropped
crap for us in several kills.Last kill we had on it, it dropped 3
shamans hammers......sigh go figure.


Karim.
